  • Method Details

    • isPassword1Valid

      public boolean isPassword1Valid​(String password1)
      First part of the validacition process of password1.
      Parameters:
      password1 - the string to be checked
      Returns:
      true if length of the password1 is bigger than 8 and if it contains only letter and brackets and if it contains at least 2 brackets and if it contains at least one letter; returns false otherwise.

    • containsUserNameSpirit

      public boolean containsUserNameSpirit​(String username, String password1)
      This method checks if the given username contains any character that is also present in the password (case-insensitive). It converts both username and password to lowercase before comparing the characters. If there is a match, it returns true. Otherwise, it returns false.
      Parameters:
      username - the string to be checked for any matching character
      password1 - the string to be compared for any matching character
      Returns:
      true if the strings contain any matching character, false otherwise

    • isBalancedPassword

      public boolean isBalancedPassword​(String password1)
      This method checks if the given password is balanced in terms of brackets ('[', ']', '(', ')', '{', '}') and that the opening and closing brackets are correctly ordered and nested. It uses a stack to push any bracket characters in the password string. It then pops the brackets from the stack and compares them with their respective closing bracket. If a closing bracket is found without its matching opening bracket, or if the stack is not empty at the end of the process, it returns false. Otherwise, it returns true.
      Parameters:
      password1 - the password string to be checked for balanced brackets
      Returns:
      true if the password string has balanced brackets, false otherwise

    • isPalindromePossible

      public boolean isPalindromePossible​(String password1)
      This is a wrapper class for recursive isPalindromePossible1 method. First all elements other than letters is removed from the string Then all letters is made lower case
      Parameters:
      password1 - the string that will be controlled if it is possible to obtain a palindrome by rearranging the letters in the string
      Returns:
      true if it is possible to obtain a palindrome by rearranging the letters in the string, false otherwise.
